article.headline: UAB 76, Marshall 64
article.story: HUNTINGTON, W.Va. (AP) -- Frank Holmes and Marvett McDonald each scored 22 points to lead UAB to a 76-64 win over Marshall on Saturday night. Paul Delaney added a career-high 14 points for the Blazers (12-3, 2-0 Conference USA), who extended their winning streak to eight straight. Travis Aikens scored 16 points to lead Marshall (7-7, 1-1). Joe Miles scored 12 and Markel Humphrey added 10 points. McDonald scored 19 points in the second half when Marshall keyed on stopping Holmes' inside presence. The balanced attack led to a 54 percent shooting performance from the floor for the Blazers. Marshall struggled to shoot 40 percent and was outrebounded for the first time in five games. Miles scored eight straight points for the Thundering Herd in the second half, but UAB followed each basket by getting up the court in transition. After UAB opened up a double-digit lead following a layup by Holmes, Marshall reeled off seven straight points to cut the lead to 49-46 with 11:26 left. But Delaney and McDonald hit 12 straight free throws down the stretch to seal the victory. Marshall was held without a field goal over the final 5:24 of the first half. McDonald's 3-pointer at the buzzer capped a 13-2 run that gave the Blazers a 35-26 lead. Holmes' dunk at the 3:06 mark of the first half broke his previous career-high of 14 points. He ended the half with 17 points.<

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
